full_summary:
=====================================================

### 3Y002-230006 Research Grants

**Reference Number:** WS3676468073-Doc3678096133

**Tender Status:** **Cancelled**

**Publication Date:** 2022-10-06

**Tender Closing Date:** **No longer applicable**

**United Nations Standard Products and Services Code:** 80160000
**Description (English):** Business administration services
**Description (French):** Services d’administration d’entreprise

**Procurement Category:** SRV
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
**Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entitites:**
Polar Knowledge Canada (POLAR)
170 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, ON, K1P 5V5, Canada

**Contact Information:**
Kristina McArthur (elle-la / she-her)
kristina.mcarthur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information
For more information on this tender notice, please visit the [Ariba procurement platform](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14287306?extsite=MTQyODczMDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Here is a comparison between the originating entry and my rewritten version using Mutation Testing.

Failed criteria:
---------------

*   I removed irrelevant or redundant information from the originating entry (e.g. empty fields) which affected the style consistency of our test scenarios, however we considered conformity with documentation overhaul because input data was given nonetheless.)

sections:
